#define BEM3D_MESH ( obj   ) 

Casts obj to BEM3DMesh

Parameters:
obj a GtsObject
Returns:
result of casting obj to BEM3DMesh.

Casts klass to BEM3DMeshClass

Parameters:

#define bem3d_mesh_element_number ( m   ) 

Number of elements in a BEM3DMesh

Maximum index of node to be considered in bem3d_mesh_foreach_node

#define bem3d_mesh_node_index_min ( m   ) 

Minimum index of node to be considered in bem3d_mesh_foreach_node

#define IS_BEM3D_MESH ( obj   ) 

TRUE if obj is from the BEM3DMeshClass class

gint bem3d_mesh_assemble_equations ( BEM3DMesh *  m,
BEM3DMesh *  n,
BEM3DGreensFunc  gfunc,
BEM3DParameters *  gdata,
BEM3DEquationFunc  efunc,
gpointer  edata,
BEM3DQuadratureRuleFunc  qfunc,
gpointer  qdata 
)

Assemble the BEM3D equations for two meshes (which may be the same mesh)

Parameters:
m BEM3DMesh whose elements are to be processed
n BEM3DMesh whose nodes are to be processed
gfunc BEM3DGreensFunc for the problem
gdata data to pass to gfunc
efunc BEM3DEquationFunc for the problem
edata data to pass to efunc
qfunc BEM3DQuadratureRuleFunc, default used if set to NULL
qdata quadrature selection data, default used if set to NULL
Returns:
0 on success

Discretize a surface by splitting its triangles into higher order elements

nne number of nodes per edge of each triangular face

)

Find the BEM3DElement of a BEM3DMesh containing a given GtsFace.

Parameters:
m BEM3DMesh to search
f GtsFace to locate
Returns:

gint  i 
)

Find the GtsVertex on a BEM3DMesh containing a given collocation point.

Parameters:
m BEM3DMesh to search;
i index of collocation point.
Returns:
GtsVertex of m with collocation point index i or NULL if point i is not on m.

gint bem3d_mesh_index_from_node ( BEM3DMesh *  m,
GtsVertex *  v 
)

Find an index for a collocation point in a BEM3DMesh. Note that this index may not be unique, for example if the mesh has sharp edges.

Parameters:
m BEM3DMesh
v GtsVertex for collocation point to find
Returns:
index of v in m, or -1 if not found.

gint bem3d_mesh_index_nodes ( BEM3DMesh *  m,
gint *  n 
)

Number the collocation points of a mesh

Parameters:
m BEM3DMesh to be numbered
n pointer to number of first collocation point. This will be set to the value of the new highest node number on exit.
Returns:
0 on success

Create a new BEM3DMesh

edge_class the GTS edge class;
vertex_class the GTS vertex class.
Returns:

Count the number of collocation points on a mesh

number of nodes on m.

gint bem3d_mesh_quad_dgdn ( BEM3DMesh *  m,
BEM3DGreensFunc  gfunc,
BEM3DParameters *  gdata,
BEM3DQuadratureRuleFunc  qfunc,
gpointer  qdata,
BEM3DLookupFunc  lfunc,
gpointer  ldata,
BEM3DRadiationFunc  rfunc,
gpointer  rdata,
BEM3DEquationFunc  efunc,
gpointer  edata 
)

Integrate the normal derivative of the Green's function over a mesh.

Parameters:
m BEM3DMEsh
gfunc Green's function for problem
gdata data to pass to Green's function
qfunc quadrature rule function (NULL for default)
qdata data for quadrature rule (NULL for default)
lfunc BEM3DLookupFunc; use bem3d_lookup_func_unit (for real problems) or bem3d_lookup_func_unit_c (for complex)
ldata data to pass to the lookup function
rfunc radiation function for problem
rdata user data to pass to radiation function
efunc equation function for problem. This will be called with the row and column numbers equal.
edata user data to pass to efunc
Returns:
0 on success

guint bem3d_mesh_read ( BEM3DMesh *  m,
GtsFile *  f 
)

Read a BEM3DMesh from input file. This is a modified version of Stephane Popinet's original gts_surface_read

Parameters:
m BEM3DMesh to read
f GtsFile to read from
Returns:
0 on success, line number where error was encountered otherwise

GSList* bem3d_mesh_vertex_elements ( BEM3DMesh *  m,
GtsVertex *  v 
)

Extract a linked list of the elements of a mesh containing a given vertex.

Parameters:
m BEM3DMesh containing vertex;
v vertex to check.
Returns:
GSList of elements connected to v.

void bem3d_mesh_write ( BEM3DMesh *  m,
FILE *  fptr 
)

Write a BEM3DMesh to a file

Parameters:
m mesh to write
fptr file pointer
Returns:
void
The output file is a GtsSurface file followed by the element data as follows:

number of elements

element data as specified in bem3d_element_write, one element per line

)

Returns:
